campaignevents-desc: Edey provide features give campaign organizers den participants.
action-campaignevents-view-private-parti: make you view private event participants
right-campaignevents-view-private-partic: Make you view private event participants
campaignevents-error-invalid-id: de event ID for be sam positive integer.
campaignevents-error-empty-title: Make you enter sam event page title.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title: De event page title be invalid: $1.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: Make you specify sam event page for de local wiki top.
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: No event page dey der plus dis name.
campaignevents-error-page-namespace-not-: De event page for dey insyd one of de namespaces wey dem permit
campaignevents-error-page-with-section: De event page for no contain sam section name.
campaignevents-error-too-many-wikis: Make you enter sam maximum of {{PLURAL:$1|one wiki|$1 wikis}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-wikis: Eno dey recognize de following wiki IDs: $1.
campaignevents-error-too-many-topics: Make you enter sam maximum of {{PLURAL:$1|one topic|$1 topics}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-chat-url: Make you enter valid chat URL.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-withou: Make you provide de identifier of de event for de tracking tool wey dem give top.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-eventi: Make you provide de identifier of de tracking tool
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: Make you provide valid tracking tool identifier
campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Make you indicate whether de event be open anaa closed.
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: De event start tym be invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-past: Make you enter start tym insyd de future.
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: De event end tym be invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: Make you enter end date wey dey cam after de start date.
campaignevents-error-invalid-type: Make you enter valid event type.
campaignevents-error-invalid-dashboard-u: De Dashboard URL dem provide no dey de correct format insyd. De URL for dey insyd dis format: $1/[Institution Name]/[Program Title]. For example: $1/Example_Organization/Example_Event_Title.
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Make you choose at least one event meeting type.
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: Make you enter valid event meeting URL.
campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: De meeting URL for no be specified if de event no be online.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: De meeting country den address for no be specified if de event no be in-person.
campaignevents-error-invalid-country: Make you enter valid country name.
campaignevents-error-move-eventpage-name: Dis event page no go fi move outsyd de {{ns:event}} namespace secof eget, anaa na eget, event registration wey dem enable.
campaignevents-edit-form-details-subtitl: Make you provide general information about de event you dey organize
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-hel: Make you add de username of other organizers so say ego give dem permission make dem manage dis event.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-cre: Dis be de creator of de event, other organizers no go fi comot dis user.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-use: Dis {{GENDER:$1|user}} no be allowed say dem go organize events.
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type: Dis event focus dey for specific wikis top anaa?
